amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to reduce or terminate any of the propagation programs listed in March 2013 National Fish Hatchery System Strategic Hatchery and Workforce Planning Report.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to reduce or terminate any of the propagation programs listed in March 2013 National Fish Hatchery System Strategic Hatchery and Workforce Planning Report.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
